//: The value of the page property is an object that contains
the page title and description. Those will be used to set
the page title tag and meta description for SEO purpose

content.title: Carol Enache
text: An ambitious and highly motivated Web Developer who wants to progress further. I am a team player that has a desire to create great user experiences, demonstrate analytical thinking and have excellent communication skills. I have a passion for technology and I am keen on progress.

content.title: Portfolio
text: To find out more about my work and research, please visit my blog.

author.//: There is no way to create comments in a JSON file and this is close enough
The 'social' property value is an array of objects,
a collection of objects, and each object has two properties,
an icon and an url. The collection and Those properties
will be used to generate the social media link bar.
